ClaimGPUInstance.title: ClaimGPUInstance
ClaimGPUInstance.summary: Gets a GPU rendering instance. This API operation has been deprecated. We recommend that you do not continue to use this API operation.

DeleteFunction.title: DeleteFunction
DeleteFunction.summary: Deletes a function. Before you delete a function, you must delete triggers of the function.

DeleteFunctionOnDemandConfig.title: DeleteFunctionOnDemandConfig
DeleteFunctionOnDemandConfig.summary: Deletes a concurrency configuration of a function.

DeleteVpcBinding.title: DeleteVpcBinding
DeleteVpcBinding.summary: Deletes an access control policy from a specified policy group for a VPC firewall.

DeregisterEventSource.title: DeregisterEventSource
DeregisterEventSource.summary: Deregisters an event source for a function invocation.

GetAccountSettings.title: GetAccountSettings
GetAccountSettings.summary: You can call this operation to query the information about an account.

GetCustomDomain.title: GetCustomDomain
GetCustomDomain.summary: Queries the information about a custom domain name.

GetFunction.title: GetFunction
GetFunction.summary: Queries the information about a function.

GetFunctionAsyncInvokeConfig.title: GetFunctionAsyncInvokeConfig
GetFunctionAsyncInvokeConfig.summary: Obtains asynchronous invocation configurations of a function.

GetFunctionCode.title: GetFunctionCode
GetFunctionCode.summary: Queries the code package of a function.

GetProvisionConfig.title: GetProvisionConfig
GetProvisionConfig.summary: Queries the details of provisioned configurations.

GetResourceTags.title: GetResourceTags
GetResourceTags.summary: Queries all the tags of a resource.

GetService.title: GetService
GetService.summary: Queries information about a specified service.

GetStatefulAsyncInvocation.title: GetStatefulAsyncInvocation
GetStatefulAsyncInvocation.summary: Gets asynchronous task records that meet specified conditions.

GetTrigger.title: GetTrigger
GetTrigger.summary: Queries the information about a trigger.

ListAliases.title: ListAliases
ListAliases.summary: Queries all aliases of a service.

ListEventSources.title: ListEventSources
ListEventSources.summary: Queries a list of event sources for function invocations.

ListFunctionAsyncInvokeConfigs.title: ListFunctionAsyncInvokeConfigs
ListFunctionAsyncInvokeConfigs.summary: Queries all asynchronous invocation configurations of a function in a service. If the number of configurations exceeds the value of the limit parameter, the nextToken parameter is returned. You can use the nextToken parameter to query the next page of results.

ListInstances.title: ListInstances
ListInstances.summary: Query a list of available instances of a function.

ListLayerVersions.title: ListLayerVersions
ListLayerVersions.summary: Gets a list of layer versions.

ListOnDemandConfigs.title: ListOnDemandConfigs
ListOnDemandConfigs.summary: Queries on-demand instance configurations a function.

ListReservedCapacities.title: ListReservedCapacities
ListReservedCapacities.summary: Queries purchased provisioned instances. This API operation has been deprecated. We recommend that you do not continue to use this API operation.

ListServiceVersions.title: ListServiceVersions
ListServiceVersions.summary: Queries all the versions of a service.

ListStatefulAsyncInvocationFunctions.title: ListStatefulAsyncInvocationFunctions
ListStatefulAsyncInvocationFunctions.summary: Queries all function resources that have enabled asynchronous tasks within the current account.

ListStatefulAsyncInvocations.title: ListStatefulAsyncInvocations
ListStatefulAsyncInvocations.summary: Queries all asynchronous invocations in an asynchronous task that meets specific conditions.

ListTriggers.title: ListTriggers
ListTriggers.summary: Queries the triggers of a function.

ListVpcBindings.title: ListVpcBindings
ListVpcBindings.summary: Queries a list of existing VPC connections.

PutFunctionAsyncInvokeConfig.title: PutFunctionAsyncInvokeConfig
PutFunctionAsyncInvokeConfig.summary: Creates or modifies an asynchronous invocation configuration for a function.

ReleaseGPUInstance.title: ReleaseGPUInstance
ReleaseGPUInstance.summary: Releases a GPU rendering instance. This API operation has been deprecated. We recommend that you do not continue to use this API operation.

UpdateFunction.title: UpdateFunction
UpdateFunction.summary: The GPU memory capacity for the function. Unit: MB. The value must be a multiple of 1,024.
